description: Used for Step 1 of TaValidator certification. Meant to be sent from a pending TaValidator to the GNodeFactory (Gnf), to initiate the process of certifying the pending TaValidator.

AlgoAddressStringFormat.description: String of length 32, characters are all base32 digits.

ValidatorAddr.title: The address of the pending TaValidator

HalfSignedCertCreationMtx.title: Algo multi-transaction for certificate creation, with 1 of 2 signatures

Axiom1.title: Is correct Multisig
Axiom1.description: Decoded HalfSignedCertCreationMtx must have type MultisigTransaction from the 2-sig MultiAccount [GnfAdminAddr, ValidatorAddr].

Axiom2.title: Is AssetConfigTxn
Axiom2.description: The transaction must have type AssetConfigTxn.

Axiom3.title: Is ValidatorCert
Axiom3.description: For the asset getting created: total = 1, unit_name=VLDTR, manager is GnfAdminAddr, asset_name and url not blank.

Axiom4.title: TaValidator has signed
Axiom4.description: ValidatorAddr must have signed the HalfSignedCertCreationMtx.

Axiom5.title: Uniqueness
Axiom5.description: There must not already be a ValidatorCert belonging to the 2-sig [GnfAdminAddr, ValidatorAddr] address.
